events.name: Thyme Deli
events.postCode: 4-6 Winter Hey Ln, Horwich, Bolton BL6 7AA
events.description: 🌞🎈 Summer Afternoon Tea with Louby Lou at Thyme Deli Horwich! 🎈🌞🌸✨ Join us for a delightful afternoon filled with laughter, magic, and scrumptious treats at Thyme Deli Horwich! It's the perfect way to enjoy a Summer's day with your little ones and experience the enchantment of Louby Lou's show! 🤩🎉🏰🍽️ Step into a world of wonder on Wednesday 9th July at 12 pm, as we gather for an unforgettable event that will last until 2 pm. 🗓️⏰🍄🌳 The charming Thyme Deli Horwich will be our magical setting, providing a delightful experience for children aged 2 years and above. 🌈💫🍔🍰 Each child's ticket, priced at £15.95, includes a scrumptious afternoon tea with a mouthwatering sandwich, crispy crisps, delectable cake, and a refreshing drink! 😋🍵👩‍👧‍👦 For adults, food and drinks will be available to purchase separately, ensuring everyone can indulge in their favorite treats while enjoying the show! 🥪🍹🤡🎈 Get ready to be captivated by Louby Lou's magical performance, filled with laughter, interactive games, and the joy of imagination! It's a Summer afternoon you won't want to miss! 🌞🤗 🎉🎈 Secure your spot now and create beautiful memories that will last a lifetime. Limited tickets available, so don't wait too long! 🎟️🏃

events.name: The Bridge
events.description: 🎉🌈 Roll up, roll up for a night of non-stop fun at The Bridge! 🎪🎉 Louby Lou and her BONKAS fun Bingo are ready to take you on a wild ride of laughter and excitement! 🤩🎲 Crazy prizes await the lucky winners, and the games are perfect for all ages, so bring the whole family along! 🎁👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 And that's not all! Louby Lou's shop will be filled with delicious treats to satisfy your cravings as you play! 🍭🛍️ 🎟️ Kids, your ticket includes your very own Bingo ticket, and don't worry if you're little, because the grown-ups will be there to help you mark the numbers and shout 'BINGO!' 🎉💕 Who's going to be the lucky champion to win the giant rubber duck? The competition will be fierce and oh-so-hilarious! 😄🦆 💥💫 This event is not to be missed! Get ready for a night filled with joy and games that will create memories to last a lifetime! 🌟🎈 The adults, worry not, the bar is open to treat yourself to some Friday giddiness! It's the school holidays after all, let's have a blast together! 🥂🍻 🎉 So mark your calendars and get your tickets now! It's going to be a party like no other! See you at The Bridge for a spectacular evening of Louby Lou Bingo! 🎊🤗

events.name: The Daten
events.description: 🎉🌈 Join us for an Unforgettable Day at The Daten! 🎉🌈 🤩💫 We've got something for everyone! Louby Lou is teaming up with local businesses to create a day of non-stop fun, laughter, and joy! 🎉🎈 Working together makes it even more exciting! 🤝 💰🌟 For just £12 per child, your little ones are in for a treat with the Louby Lou show, exciting prizes, delightful treats, dancing, games, and even an Ibiza sax and snow experience! 🎷🌨️ 🏰💕 But that's not all! The Daten brings you commercial luxury soft play with ball pits, slides, and more! Let your little ones crawl, climb, and slide while building strength, imagination, and endless stimulation! 🤸‍♂️🎢 🌈🎉 From toddlers to teens and beyond, this event promises none stop fun for all ages!! 🎊🤗 🎉🥳 Mark your calendars and join us for a day filled with excitement and happiness. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to create beautiful memories with your loved ones! 🌟🎉
